mapper.insert: INSERT INTO office (office_name, address, location) VALUES (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ST_GeomFromText(#{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=Location, typeHandler=dabang.star.cafe.infrastructure.mybatis.LocationHandler}))
mapper.select: SELECT O.* FROM ( SELECT office_id AS id, office_name AS name, address AS address FROM office ORDER BY office_id ) O LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT o.office_name AS name, o.address AS address, ST_Distance_Sphere(o.location, ST_GeomFromText( #{curLoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=Location,typeHandler=dabang.star.cafe.infrastructure.mybatis.LocationHandler})) AS distance FROM office o WHERE ST_Within(o.location, ST_Envelope(ST_GeomFromText( CONCAT('LINESTRING(', #{minX}, ' ', #{minY}, ', ', #{maxX}, ' ', #{maxY}, ')')))) ORDER BY distance;
